headline: Nasdaq Sell-Off: Can Buying These 2 Safe Stocks Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: Investors are experiencing the first big stock market sell-off of 2025.  It is best to simply expect stock market corrections to happen from time to time rather than try to predict them, as the latter is virtually impossible.  What can investors do in reaction to stock market corrections?
